trends: There have been 3 other sightings in El Centro
There were no other sightings in El Centro on or around September 1st 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsMe and my dad and my friend were sitting out side when i seen a what at first thought was a star.After watching for about ten seconds i told my dad and my friend to look and seen the object suddenly move to the right .Once it was moving to the right it seemed to start moving faster after it was about three quarters of the way across the sky it turned red and then disappeared.
